title: Why cant ranked games be judged like the new grading system?
body: It would take away the trolls power because the only thing that would be affecting your score will be your skill. One person cant completely fuc* you and your teams LP score just because they can.

replies.body: Because the point of ranked is to be more competitive and team focused, if you want this system nobody will TRY TO END, they will play to save their KDA to climb, this would make it worse, nobody would play or trade in lane for fear of dying, people would FF at 20 to minimize their risk of death
